original_title: Teletubbies: Look! Playful Patterns and Simple Shapes
overview: When you need something fun for the kids to do on a rainy day or lazy afternoon, you can't go wrong with the Teletubbies! On this disc, lovable Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po play with patterns, shapes and forms in Teletubby land. The fun includes the usual adventures with Tubby toast and playtime on the meadow -- and even features two new characters.
title: Teletubbies: Look! Playful Patterns and Simple Shapes
